title: this modern sans serif
content:
Any idea what this is?

THANKS

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091219163730/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_54.png) | 10.59 KB |
author: MrKikkoman

comments.content:
My guess is that this is custom. Maybe inspired by [Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20091219163730/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/)?

- Mike Yanega
Ya, I’ve spent all day on MyFonts trying to find that or something similar. I think you’re right about it being custom. Avant Garde is a good alternative. Thanks.
The “R” reminds me of the “B” from [Progress Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20091219163730/http:/www.alias.uk.com/progress_frameset.html) by Alias. Not exact but similar type of feel.
